features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新
• 新增锁屏长时钟。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 锁屏自定义 > 点击时钟即可编辑
• 新增视频壁纸，支持最长 10 秒动态效果。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 锁屏自定义 > 锁屏样式 > 选择照片 > 视频
• 新增长按桌面空白区域进入编辑模式功能
• 优化 Mini 窗交互体验，拖拽 Mini 窗边角，可切换为悬浮窗与全屏
• 新增状态栏图标自定义功能，可自由选择需要显示的状态栏图标。体验路径：设置 > 通知和状态栏 > 状态栏
• 新增充电提示音开关功能。体验路径：设置 > 声音和触感 > 更多声音设置 > 充电提示音
• 新增个人热点隐藏功能。体验路径：设置 > 移动网络 > 个人热点 > 更多共享设置 > 隐藏热点
• 新增支持乐播无线投屏协议，一键投屏更多智能电视
• 新增人脸解锁接入胶囊。体验路径：设置 > 通知和状态栏 > 灵动胶囊 > 人脸识别
• 提升系统稳定性
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持
Dear user, this update mainly enhances the system performance. Update to enjoy the improvements
• The lock screen offers a bigger and stretched clock style. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Custom > Tap the clock to edit

• You can now use videos as the wallpaper, with dynamic effects that play for up to 10 seconds. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Custom > Lock screen style > Select photo > Videos
• Long press the blank area of the home screen to start editing
• Optimizes the mini window interaction. You can drag its corners to switch the mini window into a floating window or full screen
• Status bar enables icon customization, allowing you to choose which status bar icons to display. Try it out by going to: Settings > Notifications & status bar > Status bar
• Charging alert sound can be turned on or off as needed. Try it out by going to: Settings > Sound & haptics > More sound settings > Charging alert sound
• You can now hide your personal hotspot. Try it out by going to: Settings > Mobile network > Personal hotspot > More > Hide personal hotspot
• Supports LeBo screen casting protocols, allowing one-tap connection to more smart TVs
• Face recognition is integrated into Magic Capsule. Try it out by going to: Settings > Notifications & status bar > Magic Capsule > Face recognition
• Improves the system stability

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating 2. Discover more information on product features in Tips 3. If you encounter any issue during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us
